title: Quarto Homepage on Github
text:
Creating a website in Quarto
Publish the quarto homepage on GitHub via GitHub Actions.

title: Applied Bioinformatics
text:
The main aim with this course is to share how to use bioinformatics tools in a reproducible and scalable way. I will showcase the use of environments, containers, and established pipelines so that you can run these analyses on any operating system, as well as on systems that are not high performance computing clusters. And first and foremost: these tools and techniques can be used regardless of which type of bioinformatics you are ultimately working with.
The website will remain active after the course so that you have access to the material even after the course.
I want to thank Lizel Potgieter for her valuable contributions to the materials for this course!

title: About
text:
This course is a hosted by the Swedish Agricultural Universityâ€™s Bioinformatics Infrastructure (SLUBI).
In this course we hope to give you information on how to use reproducible bioinformatics pipelines, report results in a streamlined manner, and implement the system in your own research.
Feedback is appreciated!
(This is a Quarto website. To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.)
